If any question arises as to the interpretation ofany award of the Tribunal, the Minister or any party to theaward may apply to the Tribunal for a decision on suchquestion and the Tribunal shall decide the matter afterhearing the parties or without such hearing provided theconsent of the parties has first been obtained. The decision ofthe Tribunal shall be notified to the parties and shall bebinding in the same manner as the decision in an originalaward.
